name: Time is Money (DDDDD00, Synorin, diord, ZvezdaChet, PopUrSkullz)
name_original: Time is Money (DDDDD00, Synorin, diord, ZvezdaChet, PopUrSkullz)
description: The world was struck by a terrible disease that turns people into monsters Not sick, only the tops of society, the richest people You are a mercenary who kills monsters for money and for them you buy medicine from a merchant that prolongs your life
